title: Technology meets humanity at Swinburne
summary: Swinburne University of Technology is focused on using technology to solve problems and improve lives. Some of the university's research projects include using robots to help people with dementia, developing new ways to detect cyber attacks, and creating apps to help people make their homes more energy efficient. The university is also working on ways to use legumes to reduce the environmental impact of agriculture.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the Swinburne University of Technology research focuses on using technology to improve lives and the state of our planet through better and smarter applications.
